content: fingerless mittens © chris de longpré 2016 all rights reserved www knittingatknoon com quick to knit and fun to wear in one size to fit most women s hands materials yarn ~150 yds worsted wt needles suitable needles for knitting in the round us size 8 or size needed to achieve gauge other stitch markers small stitch holder tapestry needle this pattern is free for non-commercial use gauge 20 sts and 26 row = 4 10 cm in stockinet st notes 1 bobble means bind off 2 co means cast on 3 kfb means to knit in the front and the back of the same st an increase instructions make 2 co 36 sts join in a round purl one round knit one round purl one round garter cuff knit for 9 rounds in stockinet st knitting every round place markers between stitches 17 and 18 and between stitches 19 and 20 2 sts between these two markers work an increase round knit to marker slip marker knit in front and back kfb of first st knit to last st before sec- ond marker kfb slip marker knit to end of round work an increase round every 4th round 4 times more 12 sts between markers work one round even next round knit to marker place next 12 sts on a small stitch holder cast on 2 sts knit to end of round work even in stockinet st for 10 rounds more purl one round knit one round purl one round bind off loosely in knit thumb replace sts from stitch holder knit one row purl one row knit 4 row bind off loosely in knit sew thumb seam and seam at inside of thumb and hand work second mitten to match
